trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectorySchemaClass class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ActiveDirectorySchemaClass representa uma definição de classe de esquema que está contida numa partição de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A>método tem de ser chamado para consolidar a <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass>objeto que foi criado para o repositório subjacente do diretório.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> objeto que especifica o contexto para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o nome a apresentar LDAP para este <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: contextnão se refere a um ou , ldapDisplayName é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: context or ldapDisplayName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor ldapDisplayName is .

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém as classes de auxiliares do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> </xref> objeto que contenha <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objetos que representam as classes de auxiliares do objeto de classe de esquema atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o serviço de diretório subjacente resultou num erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome comum (CN) do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the CN of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o CN do objeto de classe atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o serviço de diretório subjacente resultou num erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> descriptor of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a predefinição <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> descritor do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"> </xref> objeto que representa o descritor de segurança predefinido para o objeto de classe de esquema atual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o serviço de diretório subjacente resultou num erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma descrição do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a description of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém uma descrição do objeto de classe atual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o serviço de diretório subjacente resultou num erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos que são utilizados pelo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto e, opcionalmente, versões não gerido recursos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the managed resources should be released; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os recursos geridos devem ser lançados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se apenas os recursos não geridos devem ser lançados.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto na partição de esquema de serviços de domínio do Active Directory que corresponda a um contexto de diretório especificado e um nome.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> </xref> objeto que especifica o contexto para a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome a apresentar da classe esquema LDAP para a pesquisa.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object for the schema class that was found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto para a classe de esquema que foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the class was not found.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a classe não foi encontrada.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: O objeto não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: contextnão se refere a um ou , ldapDisplayName é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: context or ldapDisplayName is .
trans-unit.target: contextor ldapDisplayName is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> </xref> coleção que contém todas as propriedades, incluindo propriedades predecessor, do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o método for chamado numa instância de objeto desvinculado, vazio <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection>coleção é devolvida.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of the properties of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref>, including ancestor properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> </xref> coleção das propriedades do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref>, incluindo propriedades predecessor.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o serviço de diretório subjacente resultou num erro.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: O servidor de destino está ocupado ou não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> do objeto para o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objeto que representa a entrada de diretório para a classe de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is not a valid instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> o objeto não é uma instância válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto está desativado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se o objeto de classe de esquema atual está desativado.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto está desativado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the properties that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> must contain.

trans-unit.target: O contexto é um conjunto de configuração do AD LDS e não foi possível encontrar a instância do AD LDS.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o schemaIDGUID para o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The SchemaGuid is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: O SchemaGuid é utilizado em muitas operações de configuração de serviços de domínio do Active Directory, como a gestão de direitos expandidos.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> value (applies to set only).
